Pre-Game Insights: Both teams are aiming for a World Cup spot, with Malawi hosting and looking for a home advantage; Malawi has a recent win, while São Tomé and Príncipe are winless in 11 matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is crucial for both teams' World Cup qualification hopes; Malawi's last win was against Liberia, while São Tomé and Príncipe have struggled in recent matches
Others: The match is part of the World Cup Qualifying - Africa group stage; Malawi is fourth in Group H, three points behind Namibia and Tunisia; São Tomé and Príncipe are bottom of Group H
